## Data
```{r}
data <- read.csv("data.csv")

```

```{r}
toy.data <- data.frame(
  part.of.speech = sample(c("noun", "verb", "adjective"), 100, replace = TRUE),
  semantic.contribution = sample(c("prototypical", "extreme", "salient"), 100, replace = TRUE)
)

head(toy.data)

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(nnet)

summary(toy.data)
ggplot(toy.data, aes(x = part.of.speech, fill = semantic.contribution)) +
  geom_bar()


```

## Model

```{r}
model <- multinom(semantic.contribution ~ part.of.speech, data = toy.data)

summary(model)
```
